featured.text: Mounted in the two tall towers of the cathedral, Notre-Dame’s bells have been ringing for over 800 years.
Why is the new tower made of wood? (A)
The new structure will be 200 meters high, 100 meters shorter than the cast-iron Eiffel Tower built 100 years ago.
The tower is built to celebrate the Seville exhibition.
The tower, of pinewood, will be built on eight pillars and will be topped with a flower of five metal petals of 700 square meters each.

other.text: The old Eiffel Tower must be torn down.
Why is Paris building a new Eiffel Tower? (A)
The old iron Eiffel Tower needs to be re-built with wood.
The name of the new tower.
To form a contrast with the iron structure of the old tower.
The tower is built to celebrate the coming of the year 2,000.

definition.zh_def: 塔，通常是高而狹長的建築物，常用於觀景或作為信號發射站。
definition.en_def: A tall, narrow building or structure, often used for observation or as a signal tower.
definition.example: The tower offers a stunning view of the city skyline.
